text:
I thought MoneyLion was a good, trustworthy, honest Company but they have proven to be anything but that.

This is a scam and fraud operation that MoneyLion is operating.

Fee- Free, Zero-fee, No- Fee (whatever they call it) checking is not free. It’s included in the membership.

Membership dues are due bi weekly 9.20 every 2 weeks unless a certain criteria is met

Loan products are traps if you sign up with a loan with them you are stuck in a financial prison and can’t cancel your membership until it’s been paid off. 

I’ve been trying to cancel my membership. I’ve paid off all my loans but the payment status still haven’t been posted it’s been weeks.  They are doing this on purpose so that they can milk for membership fees. 

Don’t sign up for this company they are greedy people and you will regret it.
I didn’t believe the one star reviews at first but yes! All the one star reviews are true don’t do it unless you want to give away money aimlessly for no reason.
title: The Truth Hurts! Moneylion a Scam Company. Don't sign up unless you want to give away your money aimlessly for no reason.

text: Don’t waste your time or money on MoneyLion horrible way of saving it will take you 99 years to get to your goal. Then it takes 10 days for your loan payment to process that’s ridiculous it’s 2019 nothing in the world takes that long to process very unsatisfied looking to cancel.
title: Don’t waste your time or money

text:

Been charged the membership fee since then, which I cannot offset since I don't have a money lion card. I ask for a callback after a long hold period and sometimes so long the system forces a callback. When I get a callback I answer and it immediately hangs up. Issues still are not resolved. Never have gotten to speak to a live person. Moneylion come on! Call me back!

My email is christopher.osborne955 @gmail.com
title: I've never received my money lion card, terrible customer service

reply.message: We value you as a member, and resolving your issue is our #1 priority! Please provide us with your email address associated with your account so we might be able to assist you.

text: I reached out a few days ago, because I wanted to pay off my Credit Builder loan with my investment account. I read the help article I was directed to, and although I meet the qualifications,  I am still not provided another option to pay off the loan in full. Now, days later, I have made several attempts of reaching customer service by phone, opening tickets via email, dms on Facebook, callback requests and my issue is still not resolved. Calling only results in excessively long wait times with the auto system eventually forcing a callback request.  I've never received a callback. 1 generic auto response to a email. No response at all to the others. No response at all to my DM. I've since noticed my membership payment has been pending over 7 days. This is a bit excessive and I'm wondering why so long this time? Also an unauthorized charge in NY. I've been unable to report it, due to customer service  being nonexistent. Moneylion is making it extremely hard to even want to even use their services.
title: Disappointed.

This is Channe'l from MoneyLion, I am the team lead over our Escalations Department. I would love to assist you with getting your issues resolved. Resolving your issues is our #1 priority. I am going to provide you with a number, that will allow immediate assistance for the next 48 hours. Please call 571-262-5660 and ask for Channe'l.  Thanks, Sheena  I look forward to speaking to you!

text: Don't use their InstaCash!  They took the payment out of my bank account yet are still saying I owed.  The payment processed on September 27th.  I filed for help online, I called customer service, and they still won't help me.  Customer service just says, oh yeah it's been a big problem so you need to submit a ticket online.  I did that once and they closed it saying I didn't respond.  Because the e-mail said not to reply to it!  It said call the number, which I did, then he says he can't help me because the case was closed and submit another ticket.  Which I did and no one will STILL RESPOND!!!!
title: Don't use their InstaCash!!!

text:
Useless Company with no Support

They didn't hire a support team so good luck reaching out to them if you need help. A bot will answer your request incorrectly and close the ticket and there's really no way around it.

If you want to contact them, you have to call their customer support line which denies you because the agents aren't available (useless). So they say they'll call you back which never happens.

Good luck!
title: Useless Company with no Support

text:
If I could rate below 1 star, I would.  This company has the worst customer service I have ever encountered.  I have reached out to them, on 5 different occasions, being on hold for 60 minutes or more.  I have yet to speak to anyone.  I have emailed, including the complaints dept.  I have gotten a standard / typical response, every. single. time.   I am so frustrated.  
The response that I received today, was " you can't cancel your membership, until your loan is paid"  Had she read my email, it gave her detailed instructions that my attorney provided me with.  

The "investment" on my account, is enough to cover the loan balance, and I'd asked that they liquidate, and cancel immediately.  Yet, I still am getting a generic response of "pay your loan in full to cancel your account"   Hello, did you even read the email.  I gave you step by step instructions, because it seems that no one with this company pays attention. 

I'm so frustrated, I'm filing a report with BBB, as well as contacting my attorney to start drafting documents to cease all withdraws from our account.  

Ughhhh...It should not take hours and days to speak to someone about my money!!!!
title: If I could rate below 1 star

text:
Would avoid this company like the plague. A number of reasons. Mostly due to the lack of customer service and ineffective app. Timeline follows:
I started in March of 2019. Created an account. Took a $500 loan. was going well until September of 2019.
Sept 2019- Wanted to pay off an Instacash loan. Used my debit card. App said it failed twice. I submitted a third time, and was successful. When I checked my bank account the next day, Moneylion had debited  my account three times.
Tried to contact customer service via telephone. Placed 15 calls over the course of a day. Was told to press 2, they'll call me back. Two days later, never received a call. Finally got hold of a human after sitting on hold for one hour. Mind you this was the 4th call that day, on hold for one half hour, then being disconnected each time. 
BTW, I tried to use the dispute function on the app. Only to have the dispute closed both times, without being contacted. 
When speaking to this agent, he said he would personally escalate my issue. Asked me to send screenshots of my bank account. Which I did, immediately following the call. I hear nothing for one week. The agent then contacted me, asking if I uploaded the screenshots. I answered yes. Thirty minutes later, I receive an email stating the dispute had been closed for non-response. I'm still out $100. I then call and sit on the phone for an hour. I speak with someone. Tell them I want to pay off my loan, and close my account. This was on September 20 or so. They could not set up a payment over the phone, for some BS reason. Told me to use the app, which had not functioned for several days. Told me to delete and reload the app, which I had already done. Then he asks me to set up a transfer on my bank's end, which would involve a transfer charge. Angry, I hung up. On Sept 25, 2019, I was finally able to set  up the final payment on the app. The money was withdrawn from my bank on Sept 26. The same day, I sent an email revoking their authorization, to take any further membership payments. I used the stupid, poor functioning app to cancel my membership as well. On Sept 30, they took $9.99. Back to the loan payoff. The app stated the payment would clear on Sept 30, then I could withdraw my investment account. Here we are on October 2, still not showing that they have received my payment. And here I am on hold again, for 33 minutes, so far. Again this is after being hung up on about 10 times. Going to my bank to stop future drafts by MoneyLion. Will cost me $33.00 per attempt, but I'd rather lose that money, the give this shady operation another penny. I am also filing a complaint with the BBB and my state Attorney General.

Just got the typical MoneyLion response. THEY DO NOT FOLLOW UP. THIS IS A SCAM COMPANY! The response below is a lie.

Please contact me via the MoneyLion Ticket MoneyLion Support: OSD-120051
title: Avoid MoneyLion, Shady practices

Then I can't pay any of my bills because they won't let me link any accounts. No! HELL NO! I am not calling them. I am tired of calling them. At this point I am pi**ed. They need to reach out to me! I can not sit on hold for hours and then receive the worst help. Then don't email them. They tell you to go to their FAQs page and then they end it with DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS EMAIL. I want my money, NOW! I will never use this service again this was in fact the biggest mistake I have ever made.  Please just give me my money! I have 3 children that have needs and I can't get ahold of no one this is pathetic! I can be reached at 4109825164 I refuse to continue to wait on hold hor 1 and 2 hours you can reach me!

text:
For the Review Board, since Money Lion is telling Lies with their replies.   I have not named not 1 employee in this post, please read it.  I only stated the name of the product I currently use with Money Lion.  Thank you!  

1. THEY ACCEPT YOUR DEPOSIT, BUT WILL HOLD YOUR MONEY

2. My issue started Wednesday and 3 days later the situation is unresolved

3. If you call, You will be on hold in excess of 30 minutes or more and guranteed to be hung up on.

I HAVE SEEKED LEGAL COUNSEL, OPENED A BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU CASE, CONTACTED MY STATE ATTORNEY GENERAL AND THE LOCAL NEWS.

DON'T EVER USE THEM AND THEY ARE NOT FOR THE CONSUMER!  

THEY HAVE TRULY CAUSED A VERY BAD SITUATION FOR ME BECAUSE I RELIED ON THEM AND HAD MY ENTIRE PAYCHECK DEPOSITED INTO THE MONEY LION LINCOLN SAVINGS ACCOUNT.  THEY CAN'T ANSWER WHY THE CARD KEEPS DECLINING.  NEVER USE THEM!
title: NEVER EVER USE THEM AND IF YOU HAVE AN ACCOUNT RUNNNN CLOSE IT AND NEVER DIRECT DEPOSIT IT!

text: I am updating a review I had written a couple of months ago, shortly after my review, I was contacted by Alexis in customer service who spent a lot of time and phone calls to straighten everything out with my account.   She made sure she explained everything and kept my informed every step of the way.  I got my money from the investment account and I was able to obtain the loan I wanted.  I was happy and impressed with my customer service experience.  I have been with money lion for a couple of years and plan to continue with them .  Good service, good app and good opportunity to manage and grow your finances.
title: I am updating a review I had written a…

text: I chose to cash out my investment in June. I got an email 7/24 saying my return will process within 3-5 business days. It’s almost October and I haven’t received my refund. It’s a couple hundred dollars. I’ve called every week, with the initial problem being that when they processed my return, someone input the wrong acct Information( they left out one of the repeat digits). I’m still waiting and I’ve tried calling the customer service number again and it’s saying disconnected. I want my money so I can cancel everything pertaining to this app!
title: Wouldn’t recommend

reply.message:
Hi Destine,

Thank you for reaching out to MoneyLion support.

We would be happy to assist with any MoneyLion concerns, however, we were unable to pull up any detail with the information that you have provided.

Please create a new ticket that includes the following:

*First & Last name 
*Your Date of Birth 
*Email address associated with your account
*Last four digits of SSN 

Best as well if details of the concern will be provided so we can better assist.


Thank you. 


Best regards, 
MoneyLion Support Team
